content: If a person consumes an average of 2500 calories per day, how many calories will they consume in a month with 31 days?

If a person consumes an average of 2500 calories per day, then in a month with 31 days, they would consume:

2500 calories/day × 31 days = 77,500 calories

So, they would consume 77,500 calories in that month.
